events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a product return request and refund inquiry for a jacket that does not fit.
Assigning the case to the returns department agent who handles refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'd be happy to assist with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789. Yes, the jacket is still unused and it is packed in the original box with all tags attached.

Thank you for the details. I have initiated the return process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email shortly. Your refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help with the refund process.
We confirm receipt of the returned jacket and have processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
I received the refund yesterday. Everything went smoothly. Thank you for your excellent customer service!
Thank you for confirming. We are glad to have resolved your issue. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime if needed.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience with us. Your feedback is very important.
